VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.supervise_result_no , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_id , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_title , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.org_id , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.org_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.apply_id , decode(VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.apply_type,'1','个人','2','企业','') apply_type_name,
VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.apply_type, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.apply_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.approve_id , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_time , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_content , (select t.dictdata_value from TD_SM_DICTDATA t where t.DICTTYPE_ID=(select d.DICTTYPE_ID from TD_SM_DICTTYPE d where d.DICTTYPE_NAME='是否类型') and t.dictdata_name=VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.is_open) as is_open_name, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.is_open, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.reply_org , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.reply_time , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.reply_content , (select t.dictdata_value from TD_SM_DICTDATA t where t.DICTTYPE_ID=(select d.DICTTYPE_ID from TD_SM_DICTTYPE d where d.DICTTYPE_NAME='信息来源') and t.dictdata_name=VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_source) as consult_source_name, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_source, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.area_code , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.reply_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.apply_phone , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.approve_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.consult_limit , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.expire_time , TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_RESULT.supervise_result_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.supervise_type_code , TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_TYPE.supervise_type_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.sp_approve_name , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.sp_approve_code , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.sp_trans_type_code , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.sp_approve_type_code , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.time_limit , (select t.dictdata_value from TD_SM_DICTDATA t where t.DICTTYPE_ID=(select d.DICTTYPE_ID from TD_SM_DICTTYPE d where d.DICTTYPE_NAME='是否类型') and t.dictdata_name=VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.is_open) as is_charge, VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.is_available , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.query_code , VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.promises_limit

and consult_id = #{consultId} and consult_id =
mapper.delete: delete from VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO where 1=1 and consult_id = #{consultId}

insert into VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO (supervise_result_no,consult_id,consult_title,org_id,org_name,apply_id,apply_type,apply_name,approve_id,consult_time,consult_content,is_open,reply_org,reply_time,reply_content,consult_source,area_code,reply_name,apply_phone,approve_name,consult_limit,expire_time,supervise_result_name,supervise_type_code,supervise_type_name,sp_approve_name,sp_approve_code,sp_trans_type_code,sp_approve_type_code,time_limit,is_charge,is_available,promises_limit,beginDate,endDate,apply_type_name,is_open_name,consult_source_name,id,tempOrgId,jcBeginDate,jcEndDate,supervise_time,is_valid,query_code)
select #{entity.superviseResultNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultTitle,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.consultContent,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isOpen,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.replyOrg,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.replyTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.replyContent,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultSource,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.replyName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyPhone,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultLimit,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.expireTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.superviseResultName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.superviseTypeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.superviseTypeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.spApproveName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.spApproveCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.spTransTypeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.spApproveTypeCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.timeLimit,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isCharge,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isAvailable,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.promisesLimit,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.beginDate,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.endDate,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.applyTypeName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isOpenName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.consultSourceName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.tempOrgId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.jcBeginDate,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.jcEndDate,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.superviseTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.isValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.queryCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select:
select
from VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO left join TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_RESULT on VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.supervise_result_no=TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_RESULT.Supervise_Result_Code left join TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_TYPE on VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.supervise_type_code=TA_JC_DIC_SUPERVISE_TYPE.Supervise_Type_Code where VA_TA_JC_CONSULT_INFO.id = #{consultId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
